anya-e1210n:22_0: Vuttattā sambadho tāva veditabbo. So ca yathāvuttājjhāhāravasena duvidho.

anya-e1210n:26_4: Uppalaṃva yathodake’ti etha vuttasamuccayatho vāsaddo viya.

anya-e1210n:57_0: Tīṇī’pi lakkhaṇāni sallakkhevā yathā atho ca sabhāvo ca labbhati,

anya-e1210n:57_4: Idha amhākaṃ biṅgaraṭṭhe siliṭṭhavohārānurūpena saddappayogassa atho vattabbo.
anya-e1210n:57_5: Yathā vacanaṃ siliṭṭhaṃ hoti kulaputtānañca hadayaṃ pavisati tathā vattabbo kathaṃ?

anya-e1210n:72_0: Ayaṃ amhehi vutto saddappayogaathappayogo yojanānaṃ nayo sabbatha upakāro kulaputtehi uggahetabbo sallakkhetabboyeva.

anya-e1210n:75_0: “Racchā ca visikhā vuttā raṭikā vīthi cāpyatha
anya-e1210n:76_0: Vyuho racchā anibbiddhā nibbiddhā tu pathaddhi ca,
anya-e1210n:78_2: nānāvidhavathāpaṇasampannanti etha mahagghavathaṃ kāsikaṃ kāsikaraṭṭhe vā uppannaṃ kāsikaṃ.
anya-e1210n:78_4: Ādisaddena khomaṃ kappāsikaṃ koseyyaṃ kambalaṃ sāṇaṃ bhaṅganti.
anya-e1210n:78_5: Dhavalavathāni ca khomassa anulomabhutaṃ dukulaṃ koseyyassa anulomabhutāni pattunnapaṭṭa- somāra-
anya-e1210n:79_0: Dukūlañceva pattunna - pattaṃ somāracīnajaṃ iddhijaṃ devadinnañca tassa tassānulomakanti.
anya-e1210n:80_0: Tassa ṭīkāyañca’vākamayattā dukulā sāṇassa anulomakehi katasuttamayattā pattuṇṇapaṭṭa-
anya-e1210n:80_1: somāracīnavathāni koseyyassa anulomāni iddhijadevadinnavathāni channaṃ vathānaṃ anulomāni tesaṃ aññataramayattā’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:81_0: Tatha milidapañho lakkhaṇapañho vimaticchedanapañho’ti duvidho’ti etha dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇapucchanavasena
anya-e1210n:81_1: pavatto pañho lakkhaṇapañehā.Dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇapañho’ti kathaci likhitaṃ.
anya-e1210n:81_2: Ṭhānuppantikapaṭihāno’ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ gambhīrathavicāraṇakāle kattabbakiccasaṅkhāte ṭhāne uppatti uppajjanaṃ
anya-e1210n:82_0: Paṭibalo atītānāgatapaccuppannānanti etha athānaṃ jānitunti pāṭhaseso kātabbo soyeva vā pāṭho.
anya-e1210n:82_1: Tatha ahaṃ atītabhave dinnadāno rakkhitasīlo bhāvitabhāvano katakalyāṇo idāni ñāṇasampanno dhanavā yasavā’ti
anya-e1210n:82_2: atītathaṃ jānituṃ paṭibalo idāni mayā dānādi puññaṃ kattabbaṃ sampatti bhavato.
anya-e1210n:82_3: Sampatti bhave uppajjivā sukhī huvā parinibbāyissāmī’ti.
anya-e1210n:83_1: Samantato sabbato sabbakāle yogo sabbakālesu sabbakattabbakammānaṃ vidahanaṃ vidhānaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:83_3: imasmiṃ kate idaṃ bhavissatī’ti pubbabhāge upāyena kattabbavidhānaṃ kiriyā nāma karaṇakāleyeva labbhati.
anya-e1210n:83_4: Pubbabhāge ca karaṇakāle ca nisammakārīti adhippāyo.
anya-e1210n:84_0: Seyyathīdanti yāni sathāni tena uggahitāni tāni seyyathidaṃ vibhajissāmīti atho anekathato mahanidānasuttavaṇṇanāyañca
anya-e1210n:84_1: evamevatho vutto’ seyyathidaṃ katamānī’ti keci vadanti.
anya-e1210n:85_0: Sutīti etha suyyate dhammo etāyāti suti, vedo.
anya-e1210n:86_1: Sesā saṅkhyādayopi ca kattuyonakattā bāhira sathesu yadi dissanti te sugahetabbā yevāti.
anya-e1210n:88_0: Sakiṃ evaṃ cakkhuṃ udapādīti atītabhave tīsu vedesu paricayasatiñāṇabalena sakimeva ekuggahaṇavārameva cakkhu veduggahañāṇacakkhu udapādi.
anya-e1210n:88_1: Bahutaraṃ avacāpevā ekavārameva vadāpevā dhāretuṃ asakkontassa ñāṇacakkhu udapādīti adhippāyo.
anya-e1210n:89_4: Byākātuṃ asakkontassa me ācikkhathā’ti ācariyassa attano anuyogaṃ anuyuñjanaṃ codanaṃ davā.
anya-e1210n:89_5: Ekacco hi anuyogaṃ dātuṃ sakkoti byākātuṃ pana na sakkoti.
anya-e1210n:90_0: Dhammacakkhuṃ udapādīti’yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammantidhammacakkhu sotāpattimaggañāṇaṃ
anya-e1210n:90_1: nibbānārammaṇaṃ huvā evaṃ uppajjanākārena udapādiyaṃ kiñci saṅkhataṃ dhammajātaṃ samudayadhammaṃ uppajjanasabhāvaṃ
anya-e1210n:90_3: sabbaṃ taṃ dhammajātaṃ nirujjhanasabhāvaṃ aniccaṃ khayavayadhammanti udapādi.

anya-e1210n:102_1: ārādhesiti yeneva sammodaniyavacanena thero rañeñā milidassa cittaṃ ārādhesi tosesi teneva sammodanīyavacanena raññā saddhiṃ paṭisammodīti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:104_1: nāgaseno’ti yaṃ idaṃnāgaseno’ti nāmaṃ esā saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmamattaṃ hotīti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:105_2: Parassāti attā’ti bhavo’ti poso’ti puggalo’ti naro’ti māṇavo’ti tisso’ti datto’ti mañcapīṭhaṃ bhisibimbo hananti vihāro pariveṇaṃ dvāraṃ vātapānanti.
anya-e1210n:108_6: Imehi catuhi saṅkhāādīhi padehī nāmapaññattiyeva adhippetā nāmamattanti dassanato.
anya-e1210n:109_0: Sace vaṃ mahārāja paṇḍitavādā sallapissasīti vaṃ sace mayā saddhiṃ paṇḍitānaṃ sallāpena.
anya-e1210n:110_0: Āveṭhanampi kayirati nibbeṭhanampi kayiratī’ti pañhapūcchanavasena veṭhanaṃ paṇḍitehi kayirati pañhavissajjanavasena
anya-e1210n:110_1: veṭhanaṃ paṇḍitehi kayirati pañhavissajjanavasena nibbeṭhanampi kayirati.
anya-e1210n:111_0: Niggaho’pi kayiratī’ti nāgasenathero musābhaṇatītiādinā niggahanayena aññapaṇḍitānaṃ niggahaṇavacanaṃ aññapaṇḍitehi kayirati.
anya-e1210n:111_1: Api ca kathāvathuppakaraṇe āgato sabbaniggaho niggahoyeva.
anya-e1210n:112_0: Paṭikkamampī’ti vaṃ mahārāja’rājā milido jambudīpe aggarājā kasmā musā bhaṇasī’tiādinā paṭikkamampi kayirati.
anya-e1210n:113_1: ‘kammanā byattattena ca vijjācaraṇasampannaṃ dhammagatānaṃ pasaṃsatī’tiādinā guṇapasaṃsanasaṅkhāta viseso.
anya-e1210n:113_2: Idha pana kallo’si bhante’tiādi paṭiggahaṇaviseso’ti’sampannaṃ munino cittaṃ…pe…
anya-e1210n:113_4: Idha pana sādhu kho vaṃ mahārāja rathaṃ jānāsī’tiādi.
anya-e1210n:113_5: Ekaṃ vathuṃ paṭijānantīti kalyāṇamaṇiādikaṃ aññataraṃ ekaṃ vathuṃ kalyāṇaṃ vā athi nathiti paṭijānanti
anya-e1210n:113_6: paṭhamadivase tayo pañhā raññā pucchitā nāmapaññattipañho sattavassikapañho vīmaṃsanapañho.
anya-e1210n:114_1: kimpana mahārāja tayā pucchitanti tatiyo vīmaṃsanapañho ṭhānuppattikapaṭihānajānanathāya vīmaṃsanavasena pucchitattā vimaṃsanapañho nāma.
anya-e1210n:114_2: Tatha’pucchito me bhante’ti idaṃ raññā attanā heṭṭhā pucchite dve pañhe sadhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:115_0: Vissajjitaṃ me’ti idampi therena attanā heṭṭhā vissajjite dve pañhe sadhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:116_0: Nāgaseno nāgaseno’ti sajjhāyaṃ karonto pakkāmīti raññā nāgasenathere bahumānagāravo kato’ti dīpetuṃ buddhaghosācariyena
anya-e1210n:116_1: vuttaṃ agāravo hi puggalo garuṭṭhāniyaṃ puggalaṃ disvāpi suvāpi jānivāpi apassanto asuṇanto ajānanto
anya-e1210n:116_5: Senti sayanti etena vādapaccathikā janāti seno nāgo ca so seno cāti nāgaseno sāmaññādīsu catusu nāmesu idaṃ kittimanāmaṃ.
anya-e1210n:117_0: Suṭṭhu thero ababhanumodīti’sādhu suṭṭhu’ti vacanena. Antarāmagge pucchito anathakālapañho.
anya-e1210n:118_0: Katametha nāgaseno’ti katamo dhammo etasmiṃ vacane nāgaseno nāma hotīti pucchi.
anya-e1210n:120_0: Assāsapassāsā nāmete kāyasaṅkhāro’ti thero abhidhammakathaṃ akāsīti iminā anantakāyassa ete anto- pavisana- bahi-
anya-e1210n:120_3: teneva jīvena nāgaseno nāgaseno’ti iminā nāmamattaṃ gaṇhāti na puggalo jīvo gahetabbo’ti thero abhidhammakathaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1210n:121_0: Upāsakattaṃ pavedesī’ti attasanniyyātanena sissabhāvūpagamanena paṇipātena samādānenāti catusu saraṇagamanūpāyesu

anya-e1210n:121_6: upāsakaṃ maṃ dhārehi ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatanti.
anya-e1210n:123_0: Kimhi hoti kathāsallāpo’ti kimhi kāraṇe nimittabhute kathāsallāpo hoti.
anya-e1210n:123_1: Kimpayojano kathāsallāpo’ti adhippāyo idaṃ rañañā kimathāya vuttaṃ?
anya-e1210n:123_2: Anuyogadānathāya ceva pucchanassa okāsadāpanathāya cāti ñātabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:124_0: Athena mayaṃ mahārāja athikā athena hotu kathāsallapo’ti iminā thero rañño anuyogañceva okāsañca deti tatha athenā’ti.
anya-e1210n:127_0: Evaṃ vuttesu athesu idha payojanañca hitañca labbhati.
anya-e1210n:128_0: Kintī’ti kimhi asaṅkhatadhātusaṅkhāte nibbāne phalasaṅkhāte nibbāne idaṃ paccuppannadukkhaṃ nirujjheyya.
anya-e1210n:129_5: parinibbānasaṅkhātaṃ upādāna rahitattā arahattaphalaṃ anupādāparinibbānaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:136_0: Yoniso manasikārenāti aniccaṃ dukkhanti upāyena pathena sāraṇalakkhaṇena ārammaṇapaṭipādakamanasikārena.
anya-e1210n:138_0: Ussahanalakkhaṇe’ti sampayuttānaṃ ārammaṇe saṃyojanavasena ussahanalakkhaṇe gaṇhanalakkhaṇe vā.
anya-e1210n:140_0: Yo sīlakkhadho varapātimokkhiyo’ti yo pātimokkhasīlasaṃvarasaṅkhāto buddhuppādeyeva uppanno sīlaguṇo
anya-e1210n:140_1: sayaṃ patiṭṭhāti iduyādīnaṃ ekadasannaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ nissayākārena nissayapaccayo ceva balavakāraṇaṭṭhena
anya-e1210n:140_2: upanissayo ca pathavī iva sattānaṃ patiṭṭhā.
anya-e1210n:142_0: Aññesaṃ cittaṃ vimuttaṃ passivā’ti aññesaṃ ariyānaṃ sotāpattiphalādike phale visesena adhimuttaṃ pakkhadantaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā passivā.
anya-e1210n:144_0: Sabbe kusalā dhammā’ti sabbe lokiyakusaladhammā uppannā na parihāyanti.
anya-e1210n:146_0: Apilāpanalakkhaṇo’ti ārammaṇe anupavisanaṭṭhena ogāhanalakkhaṇo sappaṭibhāgadhammo’ti paṭibhāgena paccathikena
anya-e1210n:146_1: saha vattantīti sappaṭibhāgā sukko ca kaṇhapaṭibhāgena sappaṭibhāgo.
anya-e1210n:149_0: Hitāhitānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo’ti kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭha-
anya-e1210n:150_0: Sabbathakanti sabbakicce niyuttaṃ sabbalīnudhaccesu icchitabbaṃ vā.
anya-e1210n:154_0: Yo uppajjati so eva so’ti yo pathaviphassādiparamathadhammo uppajjati, so uppannapubbadhammo eva.
anya-e1210n:158_0: Vaṃ pana bhante evaṃ vutte kiṃ vadeyyāsī’ti yadā vaṃ daharo taruṇo mado uttānaseyyako ahosi soyeva vaṃ
anya-e1210n:158_1: etarahi mahanto’ti imasmiṃ vacane mayā ca kenavidha pucchanavasena vutte vaṃ kiṃ vadeyyāsīti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:164_0: Nibbisaṃ bhatako yathā’ti yathā bhatako bhatakakammaṃ kavā lakkhaṃ nibbisaṃ nibbisanto labhanto dukkhaṃ
anya-e1210n:164_1: jīvituṃ nābhinadati maraṇañca nābhinadati maraṇakālaṃ āgameti,
anya-e1210n:164_2: evamevāhaṃ kālaṃ maraṇakālaṃ paṭikaṅkhāmi āgamemīti adhippāyo.
anya-e1210n:166_0: Yadi kusalā na dukkhā’ti sukhā vedanā kusalā yadi siyā sā kusalā vedanā na dukkhabhūtā.Yadi siyā sā kusalā na hoti.
anya-e1210n:166_1: Kusalaṃ dukkhanti na upapajjatī’ti kusalaṃ dukkhabhutanti vacanaṃ na upapajjatīti vattuṃ na yujjati.
anya-e1210n:166_5: Kusalā hi sukhā vedanā saṅkhāradukkhena vipariṇāmadukkhena’pi dukkhā.
anya-e1210n:166_6: Nekkhammanissitadomanassasaṅkhātadukkhā’pi anavajjaṭṭhena kusalā siyāti thero pana mayi rājānaṃ ayoguḷahimapiṇḍapañhaṃ
anya-e1210n:166_11: Rājā taṃ harituṃ asakkonto maṃ athajappanaṃ yācissati.
anya-e1210n:166_12: Atha rājātaṃ sabhāvathaṃ saññāpessāmīti manvā taṃ kimmaññasi mahārājā’tiādimāha.
anya-e1210n:166_13: Kinnu kho mahārāja ubho’pi te daheyyunti imasmiṃ pucchāvacane therena vutte rājā sītuṇhasamaññātā tejodhātu’ti
anya-e1210n:166_14: sutattā sītahimapiṇḍassa kharakhādanabhāvañca sadhāya dhātunaṃ ussadabhāvajānanañāṇato virujjhivā’āma
anya-e1210n:166_15: bhante ubho’pi te daheyyunti viruddhapaṭivacanaṃ adāsi.
anya-e1210n:168_1: Yasmā te purimāya’āmā’ti paṭiññāya pacchimā’na hi bhante’ti paṭiññā pacchimāya ca purimā na sadhiyatī.
anya-e1210n:168_3: Vaṃ niggahaṃ dosaṃ aparādhaṃ sampiṭicchāhī’ti atho.
anya-e1210n:168_4: Idāni ubhinnaṃ tattābhāvadassanavasena ubhinnaṃ sītalābhāvadassanavasena ca taṃ niggahaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto yadi tattaṃ dahatī’tiādimāha.
anya-e1210n:169_0: Tatha– ‘yadi tattaṃ dahatī’ti sace ubhinnaṃ tattatā dahati. Yadi tattaṃ dahatī’ti ca ṭhapanavacanaṃ.
anya-e1210n:171_0: Tena na uppajjatī’ti tena tasmiṃ ubhinnaṃ uṇhabhāvakāraṇā ubho’pete dahanti’ti vacanaṃ tattabhāvassa dahane na upapajjati,
anya-e1210n:172_0: Yadi sītalaṃ dahatīti sace ubhinnaṃ sītalabhāvo dahati tena na upapajjatī’ti tasmā kāraṇā ubhinnaṃ sītalābhāvakāraṇā
anya-e1210n:172_1: ubho’pi te dahanti’ti vacanaṃ sītalabhāvassa dahanena na upapajjatī’ti vattuṃ na yujjati puna taṃ dosaṃ
anya-e1210n:172_2: pākaṭataraṃ karonto thero kissa pana te mahārāja ubho’pi dahantitiādimāha.
anya-e1210n:174_0: Tena na upapajjatīti kena tasmā kāraṇā ekassa uṇhassa ekassa sītalassa bhāvakāraṇā ubhopi te dahantī’ti tayā vuttavacanaṃ na upapajjati na vaṭṭati.
anya-e1210n:174_3: Kusalaṃ dukkhanti vattuṃ vuttameva kusalaṃ dukkhanti na upapajjatīti idaṃ vaṃ kasmā vadasi?
anya-e1210n:174_4: Vattuṃ yuttavacanaṃ na yujjatīti vadasi vattuṃ ayuttavacanaṃ yujjatīti vadasīti therassa vacanena attano
anya-e1210n:174_5: vāde dosaṃ passanto taṃ pariharituṃ asakkonto nīvamano theraṃ athajappanaṃ yācanto’nāhaṃ paṭibalo’tiādimāha.
anya-e1210n:176_0: Sādhū athaṃ jappehī tī sādhu yācāmi.
anya-e1210n:176_1: Sukhā vedanā kusalāti vā akusalā abyākatāti vā imassa mayā pucchitavacanassa athaṃ jappehi desehi athenāhaṃ athiko,
anya-e1210n:185_1: kulaputtehi mayā vuttaathamattena santosaṃ kavā attano paññānubhāvena ca punappunaṃ cintevā pubbāparaṃ
anya-e1210n:185_2: sallakkhevā yo mayā vuttaathato yuttaro so atho gahetabbo yevāti.
anya-e1210n:186_0: Nāmarūpanti nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena namanaṭṭhena cattāro arūpino khadhā nāmaṃ.
anya-e1210n:186_1: Idha vipākanāmaṃ adhippetaṃ sītādīhi ruppanaṭṭhena rūpaṃ nippariyāyato channavutirūpakoṭṭhāsasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e1210n:187_0: Tena kammena aññaṃ nāmarūpaṃ paṭisadahatīti tena kusalākusalakammena aññaṃ nāmarūpaṃ aññaṃ anāgatanāmarūpaṃ
anya-e1210n:188_0: Purimaṃ bhante ambabījaṃ bhūtaṃ mūlakāraṇabhūtaṃ apaccakkhāya avijahivā nibbattena pacchimena ambena puriso daṇaḍappatto bhaveyyāti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:197_0: Pathaviyā cakkaṃalikhivā’ti bhamacakkaṃ punappunaṃ parivattanavasena ā bhuso likhivā.
anya-e1210n:199_0: Khadhā ca dukkhassa bījātīti paṭisadhibhutā badhā kevalassa sakalassa pavattidukkharāsissa mulakāraṇabhāvena
anya-e1210n:199_1: bījāni evaṃ khaṇakoṭisaṅkhātapaṭisadhibadhato pavatti dukkhavaḍḍhanaṃ sakkā kātunti adhippāyo.
anya-e1210n:201_0: Cakkhusmiñca kho mahārāja sati rūpesu ca cakkhuviññāṇaṃ hotīti etha abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāpariyāyena ekato
anya-e1210n:201_1: sahajātesu bahūsu cakkhuppasādesu yaṃ cakkhu visaditaṃ taṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayapaccayo.
anya-e1210n:201_3: Rūpesu cā’ti bahuvacanassa dassanato pana bahūnipi rūpāni cakkhuviññāṇassa purejātapaccayo paccayabhāva. Visesa-
anya-e1210n:203_0: Bhavantāyeva kho mahārāja saṅkhārā jāyantiti etha antappaccayo atīte hoti. Atīte bhūtā’ti atho.
anya-e1210n:204_1: Ahuvā sambhotīti ca gāthā khaṇikagāthā’ti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:209_1: Yathā cakkhu’ti etha cakkhuppasādo’pi cakkhuviññāṇampi labbhati.
anya-e1210n:210_0: Saṅghaṭṭanaraso’ti imesaṃ vathārammaṇānaṃ saṅghaṭṭanaraso sampatti etassā ta atho labbhati.
anya-e1210n:210_2: Tadā cittārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭanaraso kiccaṃ etasseti atho labbhati.
anya-e1210n:210_4: Na manodvārikaphasse’ti ayamidiso atho atthasāliniyaṃ vutto yevā’ti.
anya-e1210n:216_0: Vaḍḍhakī suparikammakataṃ dāruṃ sadhismiṃ appetīti vaḍḍhakī jano suṭṭhuparikammakataṃ dāruṃ sadhismiṃ appeti pāpeti paveseti.
anya-e1210n:219_1: Vinibbhujivā vinibabhujivā’ti aññamaññāto visuṃ visuṃ kavā vibhajivā vibhajivā.
anya-e1210n:221_0: Nanu loṇameva āharitabbanti sakaṭehi suddhaloṇameva balivaddehi āharitabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:222_0: Na sakkā mahārāja loṇameva āharitunti pāṭhena bhavitabbanti nakāro pothake dissati.
anya-e1210n:223_0: Loṇapañho dutiyo, rañño dhammalakkhaṇesu daḷhapatiṭṭhāpanathaṃ therena paṭhamaṃ vutto.
anya-e1210n:225_0: Catuthavagge nānākammehi mahārāja nibbattāni na ekena kammenā’ti āpāyikasattānaṃ pañcāyatanāni nānāakusalakammehi
anya-e1210n:225_1: nibbattāni sugatipariyāpannasattānaṃ pañcāyatanāni nānākusalakammehi ekena kammena ekena paṭisadhijanakakammeneva
anya-e1210n:225_3: Abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāyaṃ paṭisadhikkhaṇe mahaggatacetanā kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo’ti vacanena
anya-e1210n:225_4: paṭisadhikkhaṇe vijjamānānaṃ sabbesaṃyeva kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayo hotīti viññāyati.
anya-e1210n:225_5: Nānācetanāhi tadā idriyuppattiyaṃ sati atiparittena ca mahaggatena ca kammena nibbattaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ āpajjeyya,
anya-e1210n:225_6: na cekā paṭisadhi anekammanibbattā hotī’ti.’Saddhiṃ ekena kammena anekidirayuppatti hotī’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:226_1: Nāgasenathero pana arahā khīṇāsavo buddhamataññu tassa adhippāyānurūpena kāmāvacarakasattānaṃ nānākammehi nibbattīti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:228_1: Soyeva vā pāṭho. Ābādha- vaṇṇa- sukkha- bhoga-
anya-e1210n:228_2: kulīnaṃ paññakā ete cuddasa pañhā’pi subhasutte pakāsitā’ti ayaṃ gāthā sukhavācuggatakaraṇathaṃ porāṇehi vuttā.
anya-e1210n:230_0: Kiṃ paṭigacceva vāyamitenā’ti pubbe vāyāmena saha pavattakammena vāyāmakaraṇena kiṃ payojanaṃ athi?
anya-e1210n:231_0: Akiccakaro’ti etha yathicchitaphalasaṅkhātaṃ kiccaṃ na karotīti akiccakaro.
anya-e1210n:231_2: Saddhaṃ matakabhojanaṃ na bhuñjatīti asaddhabhojitiādiko viyā’ti.
anya-e1210n:235_0: So na tāva kālaṃ karotīti tāva tattakaṃ so nerayikasatto kālaṃ maraṇaṃ na karoti.
anya-e1210n:240_0: Abhiññeyye dhamme’ti abhivisiṭṭhena catusaccañāṇena jānitabbe dhamme, catusaccadhamme.
anya-e1210n:246_0: Sakkā jānituṃ buddho anuttaro’ti idaṃ raññā’bhagavā buddho anuttaro’ti theraṃ pubbe pucchitaṃ.
anya-e1210n:246_2: Pubbapañho therassa vijānanaṃ sadhāya pucchitaṃ pucchāpañho sabbapañho therassa vijānanaṃ sadhāya pucchitaṃ.
anya-e1210n:246_3: Pucchāpañho sabbapaṇḍitānaṃ jānanaṃ sadhāya pucchito’ti viññātabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:248_0: Buddhanettīyā’ti nibbānaṃ neti etāya sadevake loke’ti netti, suttantābhidhammapāli.
anya-e1210n:250_0: Yāvajīvaṃ sāvakehi vattitabbanti idaṃ therena’āma mahārāja dhammo mayā diṭṭho’ti avissajjevā kasmā vuttaṃ?
anya-e1210n:250_1: Rājā therassa dhammadassanabhāvaṃ paccakkhato ñavā vicitrapaṭibhānaṃ sotukāmo pucchati,
anya-e1210n:250_2: na jānanathāya thero tassa ajjhāsayaṃ ñavā evamāha.
anya-e1210n:250_3: Adiṭṭhadhammo hi buddhanettiyā buddhapaññattiyā yāvajīvaṃ vattituṃ sakkoti.
anya-e1210n:253_0: Vedagu upalabbhatīti ayampañho pubbe ca pucchito.
anya-e1210n:253_3: Ayaṃ’ye brāhmaṇā vedagu’tiādinā vuttaṃ puggalavedaguṃ sadhāya pucchito.
anya-e1210n:253_6: Thero pana vijjamānena avijjamānapaññattiṃ sadhāya’paramathena kho mahārāja vedagu na upalabbhatī’ti āha.
anya-e1210n:255_1: pe tena ropitāniti tāni ambāni avahāriyāni tāni ambāni purisena avaharitāni tena sāmikapurisena ropitāni ropitaambabhutāni na hontiti atho
anya-e1210n:261_0: Samantato paggharatīti ayaṃ kho guthamuttādīhi asucivathūhi samantato paggharāpeti.
anya-e1210n:264_0: Dvattiṃsa…pe…parirañjito’ti etha dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇasarūpaṃ bahusu suttesu āgataṃ.
anya-e1210n:264_1: Taṃ pākaṭaṃ asītyanubañjanasurūpaṃ na pākaṭaṃ jinālaṅkāraṭīkāyaṃyeva āgataṃ.
anya-e1210n:271_0: Evañhi bhante nāgasena sabbā sati abhijānantī uppajjati nathi kaṭumikā satīti evaṃ mayā cintanākāre sabbā
anya-e1210n:271_1: sati abhijānantī sayaṃ pākaṭā parūpadesarahitā uppajjati,
anya-e1210n:288_0: Nathi dutiyaṃ paññāya chedananti yaṃ chedanaṃ paññāya saddhiṃ dvayaṃ taṃ chedanaṃ nathiti atho.
anya-e1210n:289_0: Sampati kā velā’ti idāni kā velā sampattā’ti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:290_0: Tassa pañhaveyyākaraṇena tuṭṭhe rājā’ti tassa nāgasenatherassa asītipañhaveyyākaraṇena tuṭṭho rājā.
anya-e1210n:290_2: Tayo divase pāsāde bhattakiccato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamayāmāvasānā aṭṭhāsīti pañhā visajjitā ahesuṃ.
anya-e1210n:291_0: Bāhirakathāpañhā tayo. Tena saddhiṃ ekanavuti pañhā honti.
anya-e1210n:295_2: assaddhopi so tassa’ medhāvī amatābhimukho’ti evaṃ vuttehi sobhaggaguṇehi samannāgato tassa therassa
anya-e1210n:295_4: Tāni hi therassa karuṇāñāṇaṃ nāmakāyato pavattanti pakatisarīrato pavattachāyā viya hotī tī.
anya-e1210n:296_0: Addakkhi meṇḍake pañhe’ti ñāṇacakkhunā meṇḍake gambhīre pañhe addakkhi.
anya-e1210n:296_1: Athavā senakādibhāsitabbaṃ anekapariyāyabhāvena ceva abhutabhāvena ca meṇaḍakapañhasadise.
anya-e1210n:296_2: Athavā dvīvacanavantattā tassa pañhassa dvimeṇḍakayuddhasadise’tipi vuttaṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e1210n:297_1: mayādve’pi vedanā vuttā pariyāyenā’tiādikaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ athi.
anya-e1210n:297_3: Upekkhāvedanā hi santamiṃ paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatā’ti ayaṃ hetha pariyāyo.
anya-e1210n:298_0: Sabhāvabhāsitaṃ athiti’tisso iha bhikkhave vedanā sukhā dukkhā upekkhā vedanā’tiādikaṃ nippariyāyavacanaṃ athi.
anya-e1210n:298_2: Vedanāsabhāvo hi tividho’ti ayametha nippariyāyo athi.
anya-e1210n:299_0: Sadhāyabhāsitanti’tīhi bhikkhave ṭhānehi jambudīpikā manussā deve tāvatiṃse uttarakuruke ca manusse adhigaṇhanti.
anya-e1210n:299_2: Sūrā satimanto idha brahmacariyavāso’tiādikaṃ sadhāya bhāsitaṃ athi.’Idha brahmacariyavāso’ti idaṃ pabbajjābrahmacariyavāsanaṃ
anya-e1210n:299_5: Tampi āharivā dassetabbaṃ.’Yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhanti’ādikaṃ nyethavacanaṃ.’Sukhāpi kho
anya-e1210n:299_6: vedanā aniccā saṅkhatā’tiādikaṃ yathārutavasena jānitabbaṃ nītathavacanaṃ athīti.
anya-e1210n:303_0: Sallakkhevāna taṃ sabbaṃ athaṃ vadetha paṇḍito’ti;
anya-e1210n:304_0: Na rahassakaṃ kātabbanti athapaṭicchannavacanaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:305_0: Garukaṃ pariṇamatīti garubhāvena paripākaṃ gacchati dadhabhāvena pākaṭo hotiti adhippāyo.
anya-e1210n:311_1: Mantisahāyo’ti mantī vicāraṇapañño sahāyo etassāti mantisahāyo.
anya-e1210n:312_0: Mā hāyi atho te abhikkamatīti attānuvādādibhaye uppanne vaṃ ettakena kāraṇena mā bhāyi.
anya-e1210n:312_1: Katapuñño katabhīruttāṇo ñāṇasampannosammāpayoge ṭhito na cirasseva lokiyalokuttararatho te abhikkamati abhikkamissati pavattissati.
anya-e1210n:313_0: Allāpo’ti paṭhamāmantānā’ti keci vadanti. Raṭṭhakavacanaṃ āmantanā.
anya-e1210n:315_0: Khalite dhammena paggahetabbo’ti sammāpaṭipattito vā yuttavacanato vā khalite antevāsikamhi dhammena
anya-e1210n:315_1: sabhāvena taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ vavā sīlādiguṇesu paggahetabbo.
anya-e1210n:317_0: Abhivaḍḍhiyā vāyamatī’ti pariyattipaṭipattisāsanānaṃ abhivaḍḍhanathāya catupaccayadānādinā upāyena vāyāmaṃ karoti.
anya-e1210n:322_0: Akuho na varo cakke buddhādisaraṇaṃ gato
anya-e1210n:326_0: Chaṭṭhaṃ tu garupādānaṃ sesā aniyamā matā’ti;
anya-e1210n:330_0: Ñāṇaratanārammaṇenā’ti arahattamagagapadaṭṭhānasababaññuta ñāṇo bhagavā sabbaññu sabbadassāvī dasabalasamannāgato
anya-e1210n:330_1: catuhi vesarajjehi samananāgato pabhinnapaṭisambhido chaḷabhiñño ca asādhāraṇañāṇo aṭṭhārasabuddhadhammasamannāgato,
anya-e1210n:332_0: Nippabhā jātā kutithiyā vaṃ gaṇīvarapavaramāsajjāti kutithiyā micchādiṭṭhikā vaṃ bhadantaṃ gaṇivarapavaraṃ
anya-e1210n:332_1: gaṇivarehi paraṃ seṭṭhaṃ āsajja pavā nippabhā nijjotā bhaveyyunti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:334_0: Vāhasataṃ kho mahārāja vīhīnaṃ aḍḍhucūḷañca vāhā vīhī sattammaṇāni dve ca tumbā ekaccharakkhaṇe pavattavittassa
anya-e1210n:334_1: ettakāvihīti lakkhaṃ ṭhapīyamānā parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gaccheyyunti etha sādikadiyaḍḍhavāhasataṃ thokena
anya-e1210n:334_2: uddhaṃ upaḍḍhāvāhasatassa patanālike tumbo’ti aṅguttaraṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:334_3: Aḍḍhacūḷanti vāhassa tassa aḍḍhādhikā vāhavīhī’tipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
anya-e1210n:335_0: ‘Kuḍubo pasato eko patho te caturo siyuṃ
anya-e1210n:336_0: Āḷhako caturo pathā doṇaṃ vā caturāḷhakaṃ,
anya-e1210n:338_0: Khāriyo vīsa vāho’tha siyā tumbo dasammaṇaṃ
anya-e1210n:339_0: Āḷahako nithiyaṃ tumbo patho tu nāḷi nāriyaṃ,
anya-e1210n:340_0: Vāho tu sakaṭo ceko dasa doṇā tu ammaṇa’nti;
anya-e1210n:341_0: Abhidhānappadipikāyaṃ vutto sakaṭapapamāṇo vāho’ti vinayaṭīkāyampana’ dve sakaṭā vāhā eko vāho’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:341_1: Vihīnaṃ vāhasatañca aḍḍhacūlañca vāhasatassa aḍaḍhañaca cūḷaṃ aḍaḍhato thokena ūnaṃ vā hoti.
anya-e1210n:341_2: Yathāvuttavāhato adhikāni vīhisattammaṇāni vīhīnaṃ satta ammaṇāni dve ca tumbā hontī’ti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:342_0: Ekaccharakkhaṇe pavattacittassā’ti imassa lakkhanti iminā sambadho.
anya-e1210n:342_1: Lakkhanati ci gahaṇasallakkhaṇathaṃ sampadānathe cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ’ divāvihāraṃ pāvisī’ti divāvihārathāya pāvisitiādisu viya.
anya-e1210n:344_0: Ciṇhañcāpi tu sobhā tu paramā susamā’tha cā’ti;
anya-e1210n:346_0: Evaṃ ekaccharakkhaṇe pavattacittassa ettakavīhito anekabhāvaṃ dassevā idāni ekaccharakkhaṇe pavattacittassa
anya-e1210n:349_0: Ime sattavidhā cittā pavattantīti imāni sattavidhāni cittāni pavattanti.
anya-e1210n:353_0: Pañcasu ṭhānesu’ti heṭṭhā vuttesu tīsu ṭhānesu rāgadosatanuṭṭhānadvayaṃ pakkhipivā pañca ṭhānāni veditabbāni.
anya-e1210n:354_0: Dasasu ṭhānesu’ti heṭṭhā pañcaṭṭhānāni ceva gahitaggahaṇanayena sakkāyadiṭṭhi-
anya-e1210n:354_4: Aparāti pañcā’ti dasa ṭhānāni vipassanāya ārammaṇabhutā pañcupādānakkhadhā yevāti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:357_0: Tathā’ti bhagavato lahukaparivattane. Uttarikāraṇa’nti yamakapāṭihāriyato uttariyaṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e1210n:361_0: Chakoṭṭhāse kate kappe’ti catusaṭṭhiantarakappapamāṇe vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyikappe chakoṭṭhāse kate.
anya-e1210n:362_0: Atikkante paṭhamakoṭṭhāse kiñci sādhikadasantarakappapamāṇe vicaṭṭaṭṭhāyikappassa paṭhamakoṭaṭhāse atikkante
anya-e1210n:365_0: Āgantaṃ sādhanaṃ kammaṃ aniccaṃ niyamo bhave;
anya-e1210n:370_0: Evaṃ vutte yamakamme ca niyamakamme ca.
anya-e1210n:371_1: evamadhippāyo athi yaṃ yena guṇena hetu bhutena…pe…evaṃ adhippayo hoti taṃ buddhānaṃ guṇaṃ abhutaṃ athiti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:372_0: Parakkamo dakkhāpito’ti pāramīpūraṇe parakkamo vāyāmo dakkhāpito pekkhāpito.
anya-e1210n:373_0: Hiyyo obhāsitā’ti jinānaṃ pāramī ca nayā bhiyyo atisayena obhāsitā.
anya-e1210n:374_0: Bhidi tithiyānaṃ vādagaṇṭhinti vaṃ tithiyānaṃ micchāvādagaṇṭhiṃ pabhidi.
anya-e1210n:376_0: Gambhīro uttānikato’ti ativiya gambhīro pañho tayā uttātīkato.
anya-e1210n:377_0: Sammāladdhaṃ jinaputtānaṃ nibbāhananti paramicchāvādaharaṇe upāyasaṅkhātaṃ nibbāhanamukhaṃ jinaputtānaṃ jinaputtehi suṭṭhu laddhaṃ.
anya-e1210n:378_0: Evametanti sabbaṃ heṭṭhāvuttavacanaṃ tayā vuttaṃ yathā hoti taṃ,
anya-e1210n:379_0: Sabbaṃ vacanaṃ evaṃ sabhāvato hotīti ajjhāhārayojanā;

anya-e1210n:383_0: Nathaññaṃ cethāti etesu saccesu vijjamānaṃ saccato aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭivedhassa ca nathi.
anya-e1210n:384_1: Sīhasaddo vā usabhasaddo vā aññasaddena payutto seṭṭhavācako hotīti.

anya-e1210n:387_0: Mukhapānenapi dvayasantipāto bhavatīti mukhapānenapi saha mātā ca utunī gabbho paccupaṭṭhito’ti dvayasannipāto bhavati.
anya-e1210n:388_0: Purimena tatha kāraṇaṃ vakkhāmīti purimena sāmavathunā tesaṃ dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sannipātānaṃ antogadhabhāve kāraṇaṃ yūttivacanaṃ kathessāmi.
anya-e1210n:389_0: Te sabbe’ti ye keci sattā mātugabbhaṃ okkantā te sabbe sattā ye vanarukkhādayo’ti yojanā.

anya-e1210n:393_0: Taṃ khayaṃ paridīpayanto’ti tena vacanena pubbapañcavassasatappa-

anya-e1210n:397_0: Tatra ye te satte kammaṃ vibādhati te ime sattā kāraṇaṃ paṭibāhanti,

anya-e1210n:397_4: dukkha vedanā vedayantīti ye pana sattā kāraṇaṃ paṭibāhanti tesaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ micchā’ti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:398_0: Tatra ye te navavidhā’ti tatra dasavidhesu kuppavātesu ye te navavidhā kuppavātā.
anya-e1210n:399_0: Na te atīte uppajjantiti te vātā atīte bhave kammabalena na uppajjanti.
anya-e1210n:400_0: Tehi tehi kopehī’ti tehi tehi sītādikopappakārehi.
anya-e1210n:401_0: Sakaṃ sakaṃ vedananti attano attano phalabhūtaṃ vedanaṃ.

anya-e1210n:405_0: Bahutaraṃ avasesanti kammavipākajavedanāto avasesaṃ vedayitaṃ bahutaraṃ.
anya-e1210n:412_0: Ayaṃ gāthā vattabbā tatha dhanahetu’ti dāsidāsasaṅkhāta-

anya-e1210n:415_0: Tāya ca pana vedanāyā’ti idaṃ kattathe karaṇavacanaṃ.
anya-e1210n:416_0: Nikāyavarañchake’ti etha lañchanti sañcānanti etena etha vā puññapāpāni paṇḍitajanāti lañchako’ti nikāyavaro ca so lañchako cāti viggaho.
anya-e1210n:418_0: Imasmiṃ pañhe therassa ekaṃsikaṃ byākaraṇaṃ na hoti.
anya-e1210n:418_1: Tasmā vicārevā yaṃ yuttaraṃ taṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:418_3: Maggavajjhā hi kilesā anupādinnakabhutā ye neva atītā anāgatā na paccuppannā.
anya-e1210n:418_4: Upādinnakanirodhakathā ca anāgatabhavaṃ sadhāya kathitā bhagavato uppannā vedanā imasmiṃ paccuppannabhaveyeva hoti.
anya-e1210n:418_6: Tasmā therassa kammavipākato vā esā vedanā nibbattā’ti vādo yuttataro’ti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:418_7: Yadi evaṃ kasmā thero anekavihitaṃ kathesī?Ti.
anya-e1210n:418_8: Rājā milido ñāṇabhedaṃ gavesanto vicitrapaṭibhānaṃ sotukāmo hoti.
anya-e1210n:418_9: Tassa ajjhāsayavasena anekavihitaṃ kathesī’ti parihāro vattabbo aññesu īdisesu ṭhānesu yuttiyeva gavesitabbā,
anya-e1210n:419_0: Katassa paticayo’ti catusu saccesu katasoḷasakiccassa paticayo puna vaḍḍhanaṃ nathi.
anya-e1210n:420_2: Athato pana paṭisallānaṭṭhāne lahitabbā samādhisatisampajaññādayo kusalā dhammā paṭisallānaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:424_0: Antamaso accharāsaṅghātamattampīti sabbantimena paricchedena accharāsaṅghātamattampi kālaṃ pañcakkhadhasaṅkhātabhavassa pavattanaṃ na vaṇṇemi,

anya-e1210n:428_0: Aññaṃ uttariṃ…pe…satanti khuddānukhuddakato aññaṃ uttariṃ catupārājika -

anya-e1210n:430_0: Dhammasaṇṭhitapariyāyenāti yañca taṃ āpattiṃ āpanno tañca yathādhammo kāretabbo’ti vuttadhammasaṇṭhitipariyāyena.
anya-e1210n:432_0: Aniccampana rūpanti vibhajjabyākaraṇiyo pañho’ti aniccaṃ nāmarūpaṃ, kiṃ.
anya-e1210n:432_1: Rūpamevā?Ti puṭṭho aniccaṃ nāmarūpampi aniccā vedanā pī’tiādinā nayena vibhajivā byākātabbo vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo nāmā’ti atho.
anya-e1210n:432_2: Kinnu kho cakkhunā sabbaṃ vijānātīti puggalo sabbaṃ cakkhunā kiṃ vijānātīti imasmiṃ pañhe kenāpi puṭṭho’katamena
anya-e1210n:432_3: cakkhunā samantacakkhunā udāhu maṃsacakkhunā’ti vutte’āmā’ti vattabbo’ti ayaṃ pañho paṭipucchābyākaraṇīyo
anya-e1210n:434_0: Samuhato bhayahetu arahato’ti bhayahetu arahato arahantena samūhato.
anya-e1210n:435_0: Unnatāvanatā’ti sukhe unnatiṭhānavasena unnatā dukkhe maṅkuvasena onatā
anya-e1210n:439_0: Tena tesaṃ pavattenā’ti tesaṃ parittānaṃ tejavantānaṃ tena pavattena.
anya-e1210n:441_0: Uddhamadho ācayamāno’ti sarīrassa uddhaṃ sukhaṃ vaḍḍhayamāno.
anya-e1210n:442_0: Corānaṃ ukkhittalaguḷantī pothakesu likhitaṃ vericorānaṃ ukkhattalaguḷampīti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:446_1: parittaṃ nāma sattānaṃ rakkhantānaṃ sattānaṃ anurakkhanaṃ hotīti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:447_0: Attanā katena ārakkhaṃ janātī’ti kammācaraṇādito pāpapuggalo attanā katena dosena parittassa rakkhanabhāvaṃ jahati vināseti.
anya-e1210n:449_0: Buddhabalato ca mārabalaṃ balavataraṃ na hotī’ti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:451_0: Tatra athantaraṃ athi’ti tatha tesu dvīsu vacanesu. Athabhedo athaviseso athi.’
anya-e1210n:452_0: Antaraṃ majjhavathañca khaṇokāso’pi hetusu vyavadhāne vinā cetha bhede chidde manasyapī’ti abhidhānasathe vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:453_0: Saññāvimokkhoti saññāya bhāvena āpattibhāvato vimokkho saññavimokkho. Sacittakāpattīti atho.

anya-e1210n:456_0: Etasmiñca mahārāja pañhe’ti etasmiṃ tayā pucchitapañhe.

anya-e1210n:459_0: Katena ādānena vāti katena dosena vā.

anya-e1210n:493_0: So sāmaññanti so samaṇabhāvo. Aggaparisanti bhikkhuparisasaṅkhātaṃ aggaparisaṃ.

anya-e1210n:499_0: Anusāsaniyaṃ anuvāsetīti uparibhāge passāvamagge vathikammaṃvuttaṃ āyubbede

anya-e1210n:503_2: Vathikammaṃ uttaravathikammampi idaṃ nāmadvayaṃ tesaṃyeva nāmanti.
anya-e1210n:511_0: Aññaṃ kayiramānaṃ aññena sambhavatīti aññaṃ lokuttaraphalaṃ ārabbha vipassanā kammaṃ tena kayiramānaṃ aññena lokiyaphalena sambhavati,

anya-e1210n:526_0: Āgataṃ idañca terasanipāte āgataṃ phadanajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ.

anya-e1210n:530_0: Pūjetha naṃ pūjanīyassa dhātuṃ evaṃ kira bho saggamito gamissathāti idaṃanekavaṇṇavimāne vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:538_0: Sannativikopananti nāmarūpasantativināsanaṃ dhammo hi mahārājaahiṃsālakkhaṇo’ti sakalo hi sabhāvavacanadhammo ahiṃsāvacanalakkhaṇo.
anya-e1210n:538_1: Uddhataṃ mahārāja cittaṃ niggahetabbanti yogāvacarehi uddhataṃ cittaṃ passaddhisamādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgehi

anya-e1210n:540_5: Bhagavatā saṅkhepavithāradesitanayena tathā tathā hi pañhaṃ pakāseti.
anya-e1210n:540_6: Esa yathā yathāssa saddhammatejavihatavilayanakhaṇena milidarājahadaye vimati payātīti.
anya-e1210n:547_0: Paṇāmīyatī’ti paṇametuṃ vā pabbājetuṃ vā arahati.

anya-e1210n:581_0: Sabbesanti sabbesu viññāṇabaddhesu sattesu mahānisaṃsā mettābhāvanā samapharaṇavasena paṇḍitehi saṃvihajitabbā.

anya-e1210n:584_2: Tadā bodhisatto vidhuro nāma paṇḍito ahosīti idaṃ dukanipāte sabbadāṭhajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:585_0: Yathā paṇihitanti yathā icchitaṃ, yathā ṭhapitaṃ vā.
anya-e1210n:588_0: Mittasama. No’ti attanā sahajāta-sahajanādhikehi mittehi samannāgato.
anya-e1210n:590_0: Saṅgāhako’ti catuhi dānādisaṅgahavathūhi catuhi janasaṅgāhakehi saṅgāhako.
anya-e1210n:592_0: Hitesī upanissitānanti sattāna nissāya vasantānaṃ puggalānaṃ dhanayasapaññāsaṅkhātahitagavesanasīlo.
anya-e1210n:601_0: Byattasaṅketā’ti pākaṭasaṅketā sulabhadassanaṃ dassanakāmānanti sīlavantānaṃ dassanakāmānaṃ upāsakopāsikānaṃ
anya-e1210n:613_0: Vājapeyyanti sappiādivathusaṅkhātaṃ vājaṃ pivanti ethāti vājapeyyo,

anya-e1210n:614_0: Ratto rāgavasenā’ti puttādisu ratto puttādīnaṃ maṅgalathāya rāgabalena pāṇaṃ hanti. Bhavatī ha-

anya-e1210n:635_0: Ārādhako hoti ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ kusalanti maggaphalanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ ñāyaṃ kusaladhammaṃ ārādhako samijjhanako hoti.
anya-e1210n:638_0: Idametha kāraṇanti manussānaṃ idaṃ niṭṭhāvacanaṃ etha ariyamaggaapāpuraṇapabbajane kāraṇaṃ hotīti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:639_0: Sayanti sāsanassa attanā jinasāsanavibbhantaṃ puggalaṃ kiṃ sodhessati?

anya-e1210n:650_2: Mahārajā ca te akkhā cā ta mahārajakkhā.

anya-e1210n:668_0: Rūḷarūḷassa pharusātipharusassa bhīmabhīmassa jūjakassa brāhmaṇassa savaṇe vattamāno.

anya-e1210n:670_0: Hadayaṃ na eli na phalesi idaṃ sattamaṃ dukkarato dukkarataraṃ ahosīti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:673_0: Lokiyaṃ bhante nāgasena lokuttarena viññāpitanti lokikaṃ athajātaṃ viya…pe…tayā lokuttarena athajātena viññāpitaṃ.
anya-e1210n:676_0: Dibbo atho’ti dibbasadiso ca ekantadibbo ca atho.
anya-e1210n:679_0: Yo kāyassa onāho’ti nāmakāyassa ca rūpakāyassa ca badhanākāro.
anya-e1210n:680_0: Patiyonāho’ti kammaṃ kātuṃ asamathatāvasena samantato badhanākāro.
anya-e1210n:681_0: Yo mahārāja kapiniddāpareto vokiṇṇatā jāgaratī’ti yā kapiniddāya piḷitassa puggalassa niddā vokiṇṇakaṃ jāgaraṃ gatiyā niddāmissakajāgarapavattanaṃ.
anya-e1210n:687_0: Sabhāvato nathi’ti kiñci opammanidassanamattaṃ sabhāvato sarūpato nathi.
anya-e1210n:687_1: Guṇato pana anupalitto dviguṇato kiñci opammanidassanamattaṃ sakkā tuyhaṃ upadassayituṃ pakāsetuṃ.
anya-e1210n:688_0: Padumaṃ udakaṃ neva agadaṃ sāgaro tathā
anya-e1210n:692_0: Puna tīṇi puna tīṇi pañca guṇā paṇḍitehi vijāniyā
anya-e1210n:693_0: Tatha padumassa udake anupalittabhāvo eko guṇo nibbānaṃ anuppaviṭṭho.
anya-e1210n:695_0: Agadassa paṭisaraṇatā rogaantakaraṇatā amatatā’ti tayo guṇā.
anya-e1210n:696_1: guṇā bhojanassa āyudhāraṇatā balavaḍḍhanatā vaṇṇajananatā darathavūpasamanatā jigacchādubbalyapaṭivinodanatā’ti
anya-e1210n:696_3: Ākāsassa ajāyanatā ajīraṇatā amīyanatā acavanatā anuppajjanatā duppasahatā acoraharaṇatā anissitatā vihagagamanatā nirāvaraṇatā anantatā’ti dasa guṇā.
anya-e1210n:697_0: Maṇiratanassa kāmadadatā hāsakāraṇatā ujjotathakaraṇatā’ti tayo guṇā.
anya-e1210n:698_0: Lohitacadanassa dullabhatā asamagadhatā sujanappasathatāti tayo guṇā.
anya-e1210n:699_0: Sappimaṇḍassa vaṇṇasampannatā gadhasampannatā rasasampannatā’ti tayo guṇā.
anya-e1210n:700_0: Girisikharassa accuggatatā acalatā durabhirohatā bījārūhaṇatā anunayapaṭighavippamuttatā’tī pañcaguṇā nabbānaṃ anuppaviṭṭhā’ti.
anya-e1210n:702_0: Ethevākirā’ti etha eva tayā sikkhite nibbāne ākirāhī’ti abhikarohi vā ayameva vā pāṭho.
anya-e1210n:703_0: Anītito’ti anītibhāvato nibbānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesesu’pi eseva nayo.
anya-e1210n:710_0: Tato muccatha vimuttiyā’ti tato tena ārammaṇakiṇanena dasa saññābhāvanānuyogena vimuttiyā samucchedavimuttiyā vaṭṭadukkhato muccatha.
anya-e1210n:715_0: Upādāyupādāya vimuttānanti taṇhādiṭṭhisaṅkhātopaye upādāyupādāya vimuttānaṃ sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmīnaṃ
anya-e1210n:717_1: umma disvā sadevake’ti etha tathā eva ummiṃ disvā mahantaṃ dhammौmmiṃ ñāṇacakkhunā disvā buddhaṃ sokanudaṃ anumānena anumānañāṇena kātabbaṃ ñātabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:717_2: Sadevakeloke yathā dhammo ummivipphāro tathā sadevake lokebuddho aggo bhavissatī’ti anumānena ñātabbanti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:721_0: Anumānena ñātabbaṃ buddho ca mahanto buddhasīhanādo ca mahanto’ti viññātabbaṃ.
anya-e1210n:722_0: Laggaṃ disvā bhusaṃ paṅkaṃ kalaladdaṃ gataṃ mahinti laggaṃ laggāpanasamathaṃ mahantaṃ paṅkañca disvā
anya-e1210n:722_1: kalaladāyakaṃ udakañca gataṃ mahiṃ mahiyā gataṃ paviṭṭhaṃ disvā paṇḍitā mahāvārikkhadho gato pavatto’ti
anya-e1210n:726_0: Vissaṭṭhaṃ dhammasāgare’ti nibbānasaṅkhāte mahāsamudde dhammanaddhiyā vissaṭṭhaṃ vissajjitaṃ pavesitaṃ.
anya-e1210n:727_0: Dhammāmatagataṃ dhammāmate pavattaṃ sadevakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ iṃ mahiṃ mahiyā ṭhitaṃ imaṃ sādhujanasamūhaṃ.
anya-e1210n:729_0: Dhammakkhadho mahā’gato’ti sammāsambuddhacaraṇasaṅkhāto caturāsītiyā dhammakkhadhasahassānaṃ desitattā
anya-e1210n:731_0: Katamena te pariyāyena anuyogaṃ te dammi’ti anuyogaṃ vaṃ pucchi ahaṃ byākarissāmi.
anya-e1210n:731_1: Anuyogavacanaṃ te tava katamena kāraṇena dammi.
anya-e1210n:732_0: Vamevetaṃ brūhīti rājavacanaṃ bhante nāgasena vameva pariyāyaṃ brūhi.
anya-e1210n:733_0: Tenahī’ti tasmā tava sotukāmatāya satena vā…pe…koṭisatasahassena vā pariyāyaṃ te kathayissāmīti yojanā.
anya-e1210n:738_0: Mayhaṃ puṭṭho’ti imasmiṃ dhūtaṅgavaraguṇe paribyattatāya chekatāya pākaṭāya buddhiyā yuttakāraṇaparidīpanaṃ samosarissatīti.
anya-e1210n:745_0: Milidapañhameṇḍakapañhesu sabbe pañhā sampiṇḍitā pañcasattādhikasatapañhā honti.
anya-e1210n:745_2: Sesā’ rañño cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī’tiādikā ekūnacattāḷīsa mātikā niddesavasena avissajjitā yatha pothakesu dissanti tato gahetabbā yevā’ti.
anya-e1210n:746_5: Tāsu purimā tisso dhammadesanā idha gathe labbhanti,
anya-e1210n:750_0: (Athasadassanā) paccayākārapaccayathaparamathaṃ desentī pavattā dhammadesanā athasadassanā nāma.
anya-e1210n:752_0: (Niggahadesanā) sakalavinayapiṭakaṃ ādiṃ kavā yā kāci kilesapāpapuggalaniggahadesanā esā niggahadesanā nāma.
anya-e1210n:754_0: (Cariyāvodānanidassanā) sakalajātakaṃ acchiyasuttaṃ ādiṃ kavā dvedhāvitakkabodhirājakumārasuttādisambadhādesanā cariyāvodānanidassanā nāma.
anya-e1210n:755_0: (Pucchāvissajjanā) aṭṭhahi parisāhi pucchitānaṃ pañhānaṃ vissajjanāpaṭisaṃyuttā sakalasagāthavaggamādiṃ kavā vammikasutta-
anya-e1210n:758_2: dhammadāyādasuttādikā puggalānaṃ samathavipassanāparipūraṇathāya kathitā ajjhāsayaparipūraṇā nāma.
anya-e1210n:759_2: mahāpadānasuttākārā attano ca paresañca abhinīhāramārabbha parinibbānapariyosānā pavenisadassanakathā nāma.
anya-e1210n:761_1: Yathūpanissayā dissamānā dissamānakāyena desanā itivuttakamādiṃ katvā dhaniyasutta-
anya-e1210n:763_1: taṃ tatha sabhāgavisabhāgaparidīpikā abhidhammadesanā ca lakkhaṇaparidīpikā ye caññe dhammā salakkhaṇadhāraṇakā
anya-e1210n:763_2: attano sabhāvavasena vuttā esā dhammasabhāvaguṇanidassanā nāma.
anya-e1210n:764_0: Imehi cuddasavidhehi lokagganāyakā dhammaṃ desenti tesañca sāvakā’ti.
anya-e1210n:765_0: Tesu pacchāvisajjanā desanā idha pākaṭā. Sesā yathārahaṃ idha gahetabbā yevāti.
anya-e1210n:766_1: Duvidhākathā imasmiṃ milidapañhappakaraṇehonti sāpattikathā ca anāpatattikathā ca.
anya-e1210n:766_2: Tatha yaṃ therena bhagavato vacanaṃ rañño saññāpanathaṃ ābhataṃ taṃsāpattikathā nāma.
anya-e1210n:767_0: (Anāpattikathā). Yā therena sakapaṭibhānena vuttā sā anāpattikathā nāma.
anya-e1210n:769_1: Yampanarañño sañañāpanathaṃ āharavā vuttaṃ tatha āpattī’ti (dve kathā) puna dve kathā idha honti sammutikathā ca paramathakathā ca.
anya-e1210n:770_0: (Sammutikathā). Tatha sammutikathā nāma’bhante nāgasena vedagu upalabbhatī’tiādikā.
anya-e1210n:771_0: Paramathakathā nāma’yo uppajjati so eva so’tiādikātenāha?
anya-e1210n:772_0: Duve saccāni akkhāsi sambuddho vadataṃ varo,
anya-e1210n:781_0: Jātakuddharaṇaṃ pana evaṃ veditabbaṃ. Meṇḍakapañhatatiyavagge pañca pañca pañhā.
anya-e1210n:782_1: pucchasi taṃ kissa hetu“ti idaṃcatukkanipāte āgataṃpalāsajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:783_0: Acetanaṃ brāhmaṇā’ti idaṃ sathā parinibbānamañce nipanno ānadatheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
anya-e1210n:787_0: “Kuṭhārihatho puriso’ti idaṃ sathā rohiṇīnadītīre viharanto ñātakānaṃ kalahaṃ ārabbha kathesi vanasaṇḍe devatā aha”nti.
anya-e1210n:790_4: Puna ca devadatto bhave bhave yasena ca pakkhena ca bodhisattena samasamo hoti kadāci adhikataro vā yadā
anya-e1210n:790_5: devadatto nagare bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadattassa rañño purohitaputto ahosi,
anya-e1210n:790_8: Etha tāva bodhisatto devadattena jātiyā nihīno yasasā ca nihīno …pe…
anya-e1210n:790_9: puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto tāpo nāma rājā ahosi tadābodhisatto tassa putto dhammapālo nāma ahosi tadā
anya-e1210n:790_10: so rājā sakaputtassa hathapāde sīsañca chidāpesi.
anya-e1210n:790_14: Devadatto atidevassa sāsane pabbajivā iddhiṃ nibbattevā buddhālayaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1210n:790_15: Kinnu kho bhante nāgasena yaṃ mayā bhaṇitaṃ taṃ sabbaṃ tathaṃ udāhu vitathanti?
anya-e1210n:790_16: “Ayampana milidaraññā yāni bāvīsatijātakāni nissāya pucchito hoti tāni mayā uddharivā idha kathetabbāni.
anya-e1210n:791_0: Tatha ca,’yadā ca devadatto nagare bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadattassa rañño purohitaputto ahosi tadā bodhisatto
anya-e1210n:791_1: chavakacaṇḍālo ahosi vijjādharo vijjaṃ parijapivā akāle ambaphalāni nibbattesi.
anya-e1210n:791_2: Etha tāva bodhisatto devadattato jātiyā nihīno yasasā ca nihīno.
anya-e1210n:791_3: “Idampana vacanaṃ jetavanārāme viharantena sathārā terasanipāte devadattamārabbha kathitaṃ ambajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e1210n:792_0: Evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ ambajātakaṃ sadhāya kathitaṃ hotīti idaṃ rañño ābhataṃ paṭhamaṃ jātakaṃ.
anya-e1210n:793_0: “Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto rājā ahosi mahīpati sabbakāmasamaṅgī tadā bodhisatto tassūpabhogo ahosi
anya-e1210n:793_1: hathināgo sabbalakkhaṇasampanno tassa cārugativilāsaṃ asahamāno rājā vadhaṃ icchanto hathācariyaṃ evamavova?
anya-e1210n:793_2: “Asikkhito te ācariya hathināgo tassa ākāsagamanaṃ nāma kāraṇaṃ hotī”ti tathapa tāca bodhisatto devadattato jātiyā nīhīno,
anya-e1210n:793_4: Idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā veḷuvane viharantena sathārā ekakanipāte devadattamārabbhakathitaṃ dummedhajātakaṃ
anya-e1210n:793_5: sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhu’āvuso devadatto …pe…
anya-e1210n:793_6: hathi pana ahamevā”ti evametaṃ milidarañño imaṃ dummedhajātakaṃ sadhāya kathitaṃ hotīti.
anya-e1210n:794_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto manusso ahosi.
anya-e1210n:794_1: Pavane naṭṭhāyiko tadā bodhisatto mahāpathavi nāma makkaṭo ahosi.
anya-e1210n:794_2: Ethapi tāva dissati viseso manussassa ca tiracchānagatassa ca.
anya-e1210n:794_3: Ethapi tāva bodhisatto devadattato jātiyā nihīno’ti imaṃ pana vacanaṃ milidaraññā veḷuvane viharantena
anya-e1210n:794_4: sathārā tiṃsanipāte devadattassa silāpavijjhanamārabbha kathitaṃ mahākapijātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti?
anya-e1210n:794_6: kapirājā ahamevā”ti evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃmahākapijātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hotīti.
anya-e1210n:795_0: “Pūna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto manusso hoti soṇuttaro nāma nesādo balavā balavataro nāgabalo tadābodhisatto chaddanto nāma nāgarājā ahosi.
anya-e1210n:795_2: Tathapi tāva devadatto adhikataro“ti idaṃ vacanaṃ milidaraññā jetavane mahāvihāre vihārantena sathārā
anya-e1210n:795_3: tiṃsanipāte ekaṃ daharabhikkhuniṃ ārabbha kathitaṃ chaddantajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti tatha bhagavatā
anya-e1210n:795_4: vithārato desitaṃ chaddantajātakaṃ taṃ mayā idha saṅkhepato uddharivā kathetabbameva.
anya-e1210n:795_6: sā pana bhikkhuṇī pacchā vipassivā arahattaṃ pattā”ti.
anya-e1210n:795_7: Evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ chaddantajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e1210n:796_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto manusso ahosi vanacarako aniketavāsī tadā bodhisatto sakuṇo ahosi tittiro mantajjhāyī.
anya-e1210n:796_1: Tadā so vanacarako taṃ sakuṇaṃ ghātesi.
anya-e1210n:796_2: Tathapi tāva devadatto jātiyā adhikataro”ti idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā gijjhakūṭe viharantena sathārā
anya-e1210n:796_3: navakanipāte devadattassa vadhāya parisakkanaṃ ārabbha kathitaṃ daddarajātakaṃ (tittirajātakaṃ) sadhāya
anya-e1210n:796_7: Evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ daddarajātakaṃ sadhāya kathitaṃ hotīti.
anya-e1210n:797_0: “Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto kalābu nāma bārāṇasirājā ahosi tadā bodhisatto tāpaso ahosi khantivādī.
anya-e1210n:797_1: Tadā so rājā tassatāpasassa kuddho hathapāde vaṃsakalīre viya chedāpesi.
anya-e1210n:797_2: Tathapi tāva devadattoyeva adhikataro jātiyā ca yasena cā”ti idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā jecavane viharantena
anya-e1210n:797_3: sathārā catukkanipāte ekaṃ kodhanabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathitaṃ khantivādijātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e1210n:797_5: khantivāditāpasopana ahamevā”ti evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ khantivādijātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hotīti.
anya-e1210n:798_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto ahosi vanacaro tadābodhisatto nadiyo nāma vānarido ahosi.
anya-e1210n:798_1: Tadāpi so vanacaro taṃ vānaridaṃ ghātesi saddhiṃ mātarā katiṭṭhabhātikenapi.
anya-e1210n:798_2: Tathapi tāva devadattoyevaadhikataro jātiyā“ti idaṃ pana vacanaṃ milidaraññā veḷuvane viharantenasathārā
anya-e1210n:798_3: dukanipāte devadattaṃ ārabbha kathitaṃ cullanadiyajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e1210n:798_5: supaṇṇarājā pana ahamevā”ti evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ paṇḍarajātakaṃ sadhāya paratoghosavasena bodhisatto
anya-e1210n:798_6: paṇḍarako nāma nāgarāja ahosī”ti kathitaṃ hoti tathāhi imasmiṃ jātake bodhisatto supaṇṇarājā yevā’ti.
anya-e1210n:799_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto manusso ahosipavane jaṭilako tadā bodhisatto tacchako nāma mahāsūkaro ahosi.
anya-e1210n:799_1: Tathapi tāva devadattoyeva jātiyā adhikataro”ti idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā jetavane viharantena sathārā
anya-e1210n:799_2: pakiṇṇakanipāte dve mahallake there ārabbha kathitaṃ tacchakasūkarajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e1210n:799_3: “Mahākosalo pana bimbisārassa dhitaraṃ dento…pe…rukkhadevatā pana ahamevā”ti.
anya-e1210n:800_0: Evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ tacchakasūkarajātakaṃ sadhāya paratoghosavasena bodhisatto mahātacchakasūkaro
anya-e1210n:800_1: nāma ahositi kathitaṃ tathā hi imasmiṃ jātake bodhisatto rukkhadevatāyeva ahosīti.
anya-e1210n:801_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadādevadatto cetiyesu suraparicaro nāma rājā ahosi upari purisamatte gaganevehāsaṅgamo,
anya-e1210n:801_1: tadā bodhisatto kapilo nāma brāhmaṇo ahosi.
anya-e1210n:801_2: Tathapi tāva devadattassa pathavippavesamārabbha kathitaṃ cetiyajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e1210n:801_4: brāhmaṇo pana ahamevā”ti evañcetaṃ milidaraññā idaṃcetiyajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hotīti.
anya-e1210n:802_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto manusso ahosi sāmo nāma,
anya-e1210n:802_2: Tathapi tāva devadattoyeva jātiyā adhikataro’ti idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā jetavane viharantena sathārā
anya-e1210n:802_3: terasakanipāte devadattamārabbhakathitaṃ rūrūmagarājajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e1210n:802_6: Evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃrūrumigajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hotī’ti ekādasamaṃ jātakaṃ.
anya-e1210n:803_0: “Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto manusso ahosi luddako pavanacaro,
anya-e1210n:803_1: tadā bodhisatto hathināgo ahosi so luddako tassa hathināgassa sattakkhattuṃ dante chidivā hari tathapi
anya-e1210n:803_2: tāva devadattoyeva yoniyā adhikataro’ti idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā jetavane viharantena sathārā ekakanipāte
anya-e1210n:803_3: devadattamārabbha kathitaṃ sīlavanāgarājajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e1210n:804_0: Evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ sīlavanāgarājajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hotī’ti dvādasamaṃ jātakaṃ.
anya-e1210n:805_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto sigālo ahosi khattiyadhammo,
anya-e1210n:805_1: so yāvatā jambudīpe padesarājāno te sabbe anuyutte akāsi,
anya-e1210n:805_2: tadā bodhisatto vidhuro nāma paṇḍito ahosi tathapi tāva devadattoyeva yasena adhikataro’ti idampana vacanaṃ
anya-e1210n:805_3: milidaraññā veḷuvane viharantena sathārā dukanipāte devadattamārabbha kathitaṃ sabbadāṭhajātakaṃ sadhāya
anya-e1210n:806_0: Evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ sabbadāṭhika jātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ paratoghosavasena “so yāvatā jambudīpe padesarājāno,
anya-e1210n:806_1: te sabbe anuyutte akāsī”ti vuttaṃ tadā hi sona sabbe rājāno anuyutte akāsī’ti.
anya-e1210n:807_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto sathināgo huvā laṭukikāya sakuṇikāya puttakeghātesi,
anya-e1210n:807_1: tadā bodhisatto’pi hathināgo ahosi yuthapati tatha tāva ubho’pi samasamā ahesunti’ idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā
anya-e1210n:807_2: veḷuvane viharantena sathārā pañcakanipāte devadattamārarabbha kathitaṃ laṭukikajātakaṃ sadhāyavuttaṃ
anya-e1210n:808_0: Puna ca paraṃ “yadā devadatto yakkho ahosi adhammo nāma,
anya-e1210n:808_1: tadā bodhisattopi yakkho ahosi dhammo nāma.
anya-e1210n:808_2: Tathapi tāva ubhopi samasamā ahesunti“idaṃ pana vacanaṃ milidaraññā jetavane viharantena sathārā ekādasakanipāte
anya-e1210n:808_3: devadattassa pathavippavesamārabbha kathitaṃ dhammadevaputta jātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e1210n:808_4: “Tadā bhikkhu dhammisabhāyaṃ dhammadevaputto pana ahameva sammāsambuddho”ti.
anya-e1210n:808_5: Evametaṃ milidarañño imaṃ dhammadevaputtajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hotīti paṇṇarasamaṃ jātakaṃ.
anya-e1210n:809_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto nāviko ahosi,
anya-e1210n:809_2: tadā bodhisattopi nāviko ahosi pañcannaṃ kulasatānaṃ issaro tathapi tāva ubhopi samasamā’ca ahesunti“idampana
anya-e1210n:809_3: milidaraññā jetavane viharantena sathārā dvādasakanipāte devadattassa pañcakulasatāni gahevā niraye paviṭṭhabhāvamārabbha
anya-e1210n:809_5: “So hi aggasāvakesu parisaṃ gahevā sopaṇḍitavaḍaḍhakī nāma ahamevā”ti.
anya-e1210n:809_6: Evametaṃ milidararañañā imaṃ samuddavāṇijajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hotī’ti.
anya-e1210n:810_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto sathavāho ahosi pañcannaṃ sakaṭasatānaṃ issaro,
anya-e1210n:810_1: tadā bodhisattopi sathavāho ahosi pañcannaṃ sakaṭasatānaṃ issaro.
anya-e1210n:810_2: Tathapi tāva ubhopi samasamā ahesu”nti idampanavacanaṃ milidaraññā jetavane viharantena sathārā ekakanipāte
anya-e1210n:810_3: anāthapiṇḍikassasahāyake tithayasāvake ārabbha kathitaṃ apaṇṇaka jātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hotī’ti.
anya-e1210n:811_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto sākho nāma migarājā ahosi,
anya-e1210n:811_1: tadā bodhisattopi nigrodho nāma migarājā ahosi.
anya-e1210n:811_2: Tathapi tāva ubhopi samasamā ahesunti “idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā jetavane viharantena sathārā ekakanipāte
anya-e1210n:811_3: kumārakassapamātaraṃ bhikkhuṇiṃ ārabbha kathitaṃ nigrodhamigajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti sā kira rājagahanagare
anya-e1210n:811_4: mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino dhītā ahosi nigrodhamigarājā pana ahamevā”ti eva metaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ nigrodhamigarājajātakaṃ
anya-e1210n:812_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto sākho nāma senāpati ahosi,
anya-e1210n:812_1: tadā bodhisatto nigrodho nāma rājā ahosi.
anya-e1210n:812_2: Tathapi tāva ubhopi samasamā ahesunti idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā veḷuvane viharantena sathārā dasakanipāte
anya-e1210n:812_3: devadattāmārabbha kathitaṃ nigrodhajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e1210n:813_0: Puna ca paraṃ sadā devadatto khaṇḍahālo nāma brāhmaṇo ahosi,
anya-e1210n:813_1: tadā bodhisatto cado nāma rājakumāro ahosi.
anya-e1210n:813_2: Tathāpi tāva anena khaṇḍahālo adhikataro’ti “idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā gijjhakūṭe viharantena sathārā
anya-e1210n:813_3: dasajātakedevadattamārabbha kathitaṃ cadakumārajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ taṃ saṅkhepano dassayissāma.
anya-e1210n:813_4: “Tassa vathu saṅghabhedakkhadhake āgatameva cadakumāro pana ahamovā”ti evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ vadakumārajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttanti vīsatimajātakaṃ.
anya-e1210n:814_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto brahmadatto nāma rāja ahosi,
anya-e1210n:814_1: tadā bodhisatto tassa putto mahāpadumo nāma kumāro ahosi,
anya-e1210n:814_3: Yato kutoci pitā puttānaṃ adhikataro ahosi visiṭṭho,
anya-e1210n:814_4: tathapi tāva devadattoyeva adhikataro’ti idampana evanaṃ milidaraññā jetavane viharantena sathārā dvādasakanipāte
anya-e1210n:814_5: ciñcaṃ māṇavikamārabbha kathitaṃ mahāpadumajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e1210n:814_8: evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ mahāpadumajātakaṃ sadhāya puttanti ekavīsatimajātakaṃ.
anya-e1210n:815_0: Puna ca paraṃ yadā devadatto mahāpatāpo nāma rājā ahosi,
anya-e1210n:815_1: tadā bodhisatto tassa putto dhammapālo nāma kumāro ahosi,
anya-e1210n:815_2: tadā so rājā sakaputtassa hathapāde sīsañca chedāpesi.
anya-e1210n:815_3: Tathapi tāva devadatto yeca uttaro adhikataro”ti idampana vacanaṃ milidaraññā veḷuvane viharantena sathārā
anya-e1210n:815_4: pañcakanipāte devadattassavadhaparisakkanamārabbha kathitaṃ culladhammapālajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e1210n:815_5: “Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhu dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ dhammapālakumāro pana ahamevā”ti evametaṃ milidaraññā imaṃ
anya-e1210n:815_6: culladhammapālajātakaṃ sadhāya vuttanti bāvīsatima jātakaṃ samattaṃ.
anya-e1210n:825_0: Evañca so rājā imāni jātakāni sadhāya kathevā punapi evamāha?
anya-e1210n:825_5: devadatto tassa devātidevassa sāsane pabbajivā buddhālayaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1210n:825_7: yaṃ mayā bhaṇitaṃ taṃ sabbampi tathaṃ udāhu vitathanti.”
anya-e1210n:831_0: Āsajja rājā citrakathī ukkādhāraṃ tamonudaṃ apucchi nipuṇe pañhe ṭhānāṭhānagate puthū,
anya-e1210n:840_0: Sāmayiko ca kusalo paṭibhāne ca kovido;
anya-e1210n:848_0: Katheti so manussehi pabbate kesarī yathā’ti;
anya-e1210n:849_0: Caraṇena ceva sampannaṃ sudantaṃ uttame dame,
anya-e1210n:851_0: Kathikā mayā bahū diṭṭhā sākacchā osaṭā bahū,
anya-e1210n:852_0: Na tādisaṃ bhayaṃ āsi ajjatāso yathā mama;
anya-e1210n:854_0: Jayo’va nāgasenassa yathā cittaṃ na saṇṭhitanti;
anya-e1210n:856_0: Yathā hi aṅgasambhārā hoti saddo ratho iti,
anya-e1210n:857_0: Evaṃ khadhesu santesu hoti sattoti sammuti;
anya-e1210n:858_0: Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañeñā cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ,
anya-e1210n:859_0: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭanti;
anya-e1210n:860_0: Ayampatiṭṭhā dharaṇīva pāṇinaṃ idañca mūlaṃ kusalābhivuddhiyā,
anya-e1210n:868_0: Paṭigacceva taṃ kayirā yaṃ jaññā hitamattano,
anya-e1210n:870_0: Yathā sākaṭiko nāma samaṃ hivā mahāpathaṃ,
anya-e1210n:890_0: Patho ca saṅkamo tithaṃ aṭṭhete parivajjiyā;
anya-e1210n:891_0: Ratto duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca mānī luddho tathā’laso,
anya-e1210n:892_0: Ekacintī ca bālo ca ete athavināsakā;
anya-e1210n:893_0: Ratto duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca bhīru āmisacakkhuko,
anya-e1210n:894_0: Ithi soṇḍo paṇḍako ca navamo bhavati dārako;
anya-e1210n:895_0: Navete puggalā loke ittarā calitā calā,
anya-e1210n:896_0: Etehi mantitaṃ guyhaṃ khippaṃ bhavati pākaṭaṃ;
anya-e1210n:900_0: Yesaṃ etāni samhonti tesaṃ buddhi pabhijjati;
anya-e1210n:902_0: Na sādiyanti sakkāraṃ buddhānaṃ esa dhammatā’ti
anya-e1210n:921_0: Mayhampi vacanaṃ athi bhājadvāja suṇohi me’ti; (Jātakagāthā)
anya-e1210n:922_0: Cudassa bhattaṃ bhuñjivā kammārassā’ti me sutaṃ,
anya-e1210n:924_0: Sathavāto bhayaṃ jātaṃ niketā jāyatī rajo,
anya-e1210n:925_0: Aniketamasathavaṃ etaṃ ve munidassananti; (Jinabhāsitā minidena vuttā)
anya-e1210n:927_0: Na icche saha nidāya evaṃ sayha vijānahīti; (Jātakagāthā lomakassapena vuttā)
anya-e1210n:936_0: Na me ācariyo atha sadiso me na vijjati,
anya-e1210n:937_0: Sadevakasmiṃ lokasmiṃ nathi me paṭipuggalo’ti; (Khadhakagāthā jinabhāsitā)
anya-e1210n:944_0: Ussahate tārayituṃ mārabalanisūdane buddhe’ti; (Ayaṃ gāthā sāriputtatherenābhatā)
anya-e1210n:946_0: Dhunātha maccuno senaṃ naḷāgāraṃ’va kuñjaro’ti; (Jinabhāsitā milidena vuttā)
anya-e1210n:947_0: Yo sīla vā dussīlesu dadāti dānaṃ
anya-e1210n:950_0: Taṃ ve dānaṃ dāyakato visujjhatī’ti; (Ayaṃ nāgasenena ābhatā)
anya-e1210n:951_0: Na me dessā ubho puttā maddī devī na appiyā,
anya-e1210n:952_0: Sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ tasmā piye adāsahanti;
anya-e1210n:953_0: Sahassagghañhi maṃ tāto brāhmaṇassa pitā adā,
anya-e1210n:954_0: Atho kaṇhājinaṃ kaññaṃ hathinañca satena cā’ti;
anya-e1210n:955_0: Jigacchāya pipāsāya ahinā daṭṭho visena ca,
anya-e1210n:956_0: Aggi udaka sattīhi akāle tatha miyyati;
anya-e1210n:962_0: Na pupphagadho paṭivātameti na cadanaṃ tagaramallikā vā,
anya-e1210n:963_0: Satañca gadho paṭivātameti sabbā disāsappuriso pavāti;
anya-e1210n:964_0: Cadanaṃ tagaraṃ vāpi uppalaṃ atha vassikī,
anya-e1210n:967_0: Yo ca sīlavataṃ gadho vāta devesu uttamo’ti;
anya-e1210n:968_0: Kammamūlaṃ janā davā gaṇhanti amataṃ phalaṃ,
anya-e1210n:969_0: Tena te sukhitā honti ye kītā amataṃ phalanti;
anya-e1210n:970_0: Ye keci loke agadā visānaṃ paṭibāhakā,
anya-e1210n:972_0: Ye keci osadhā loke vijjanti vividhā bahū,
anya-e1210n:973_0: Dhammosadha samaṃ nathi etaṃ pivatha bhikkhavo’ti;
anya-e1210n:979_0: Kammena taṃ kiṇivāna ratanaṃ vo piladhathā’ti;
anya-e1210n:981_0: Na ca vikkhippate cittaṃ etaṃ tumhe piladhathā’ti;
anya-e1210n:983_0: Khippaṃ phasseti amataṃ na ca so rocate bhave’ti;
anya-e1210n:991_0: Kammena taṃ kiṇivāna ratanaṃ vo piladhathā’ti;
anya-e1210n:1004_0: Ratā ekāsane viññu dhammanagare vasanti te;
anya-e1210n:1011_0: Sotāpannā ca vimalā sakadāgāmino ca ye,
anya-e1210n:1012_0: Anāgāmī ca arahanto dhammanagare vasanti te;
anya-e1210n:1020_0: Sudantā uttame dame dhammanagare vasanti te;
anya-e1210n:1021_0: Tevijjā jaḷabhiññā ca iddhiyā pāramiṃ gatā,
anya-e1210n:1026_0: Anumānena jānanti athi so bhagavā iti;
anya-e1210n:1028_0: Yathā’yaṃ dissate ūmī mahanto so bhavissati;
anya-e1210n:1034_0: Yathā accuggato esa himavā so bhavissati;
anya-e1210n:1038_0: Tathā hi so mahāvīro aggo buddho bhavissati;
anya-e1210n:1051_0: Laggaṃ disvā bhisaṃ paṅkaṃ kalaladdagataṃ mahiṃ,
anya-e1210n:1058_0: Yathā’yaṃ vāyatī gadho hessanti pupphitā dumā;
anya-e1210n:1063_0: Puna passati gihi rājā anāgāmiphale ṭhite;
anya-e1210n:1064_0: Ubho’pi te vilokevā uppajji saṃsayo mahā,
anya-e1210n:1065_0: Bujjheyya ce gihidhamme dhutaṅgaṃ nipphalaṃ siyā;
anya-e1210n:1067_0: Hada pucche kathiseṭṭhaṃ so me kaṅkhaṃ vinossatī’ti
anya-e1210n:1069_0: Milidappakaraṇe sabbā gāthā sampiṇḍitā caturādhikasatagāthā honti.
anya-e1210n:1072_0: Saṅkhyāsarūpaṃ pana evaṃ veditabbaṃ. Eka- dvi- ti- catu- pañca- cha- satta- aṭṭha- nava- dasa- ekādasa- dvādasa- terasa- cuddasa- soḷasa-
anya-e1210n:1072_13: brahmaloko eko’ti cha ekakā milidappakaraṇe āgatā.
anya-e1210n:1073_0: Dve athavase sampassamānā bhagavatā vihāradānaṃ anuññātaṃ?
anya-e1210n:1073_1: Vihāradānaṃ nāma sabbabuddhehi vaṇṇitaṃ anumataṃ thomitaṃ pasathaṃ vihāradānaṃ davā devamanussā jātijarābyādhimaraṇehi muccissanti.
anya-e1210n:1073_2: Vihāre sati bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo vā katokāsā dassanakāmānaṃ sulabhadassanaṃ bhavissantī’ti.
anya-e1210n:1074_0: Dve athavase paṭicca sabbabuddhā attanā nimmitaṃ catupaccayaṃ na paribhuñjanti?
anya-e1210n:1074_1: Aggadakkhiṇeyyo sathā’ti bahū devamanussā catupaccayaṃ datvā dukkhā muccissanti.
anya-e1210n:1074_2: Buddhā paṭihāriyaṃ kavā jīvitavuttiṃ pariyesantī’ti parūpavādalopanathañcāti.
anya-e1210n:1075_0: Dve akammajā ahetujā anutujā? Ākāso nibbānañcā’ti
anya-e1210n:1076_0: Dve athavase sampassamānena vessantarena raññā dve puttā dinnā?
anya-e1210n:1077_0: Udakassa dve guṇā nibbānaṃ anuppaviṭṭhā? Sītalabhāvo, pītassa ghammavinayanabhāvo cā’ti.
anya-e1210n:1078_0: Asatiyā ajānanena cā’ti dvīhi kāraṇehi āpattiṃ āpajjantī’ti cha dukā āgatā.
anya-e1210n:1079_0: Sītena uṇhena atibhojanenā’ti tīhi ākārehi pittaṃ kuppati.
anya-e1210n:1080_0: Sītena uṇhena annāpānena cā’ti tahī ākārehi semhaṃ kuppati.
anya-e1210n:1081_0: Buddhavaṃsatāya dhammagarukatāya bhikkhubhumimahantatāyā’ti tīhi kāraṇehi pātimokkhaṃ paṭicchannaṃ kārāpeti.
anya-e1210n:1082_0: Agadassa tayo guṇā nibbānaṃ anuppaviṭṭhā? Gilānakānaṃ parisaraṇaṃ rogavināsanaṃ amatakaraṇanti.
anya-e1210n:1083_0: Maṇiratanassa tayo guṇā nibbānaṃ anuppaviṭṭhā? Sabbakāmadadaṃ nahāsakaraṃ ujjotathakaranti.
anya-e1210n:1084_0: Ratanacadanassa tayo guṇā? Vaṇṇasampanno gadhasampanno rasasampanno’ti satta tikā vuttā.
anya-e1210n:1085_4: sabbabuddhapasathatāyāti ime cattāro athavase sampassamānā buddhā paṭisallānaṃ sevanti.
anya-e1210n:1086_0: Ninnatāya dvāratāya ciṇṇatāya samudācaritattāti catuhi ākārehi manoviññāṇaṃ dvipañcaviññāṇe anupavattati.
anya-e1210n:1087_0: Kammavasena yonivasena kulavasena āyācanavasenā’ti catunnaṃ sannipātānaṃ vasena gabbhassāvakkanti hoti.
anya-e1210n:1088_2: upakkhaṭantarāyo paribhogantarāyo’ti cattāro antarāyā tesu adiṭṭhantarāyo bhagavato athi,
anya-e1210n:1088_4: uddissakatassa byāmappabhāya sabbaññutañāṇassa jīvitassa cā’ti catunnaṃ antarāyābhāvā.
anya-e1210n:1089_1: rāhu cā’ti cattāro sūriyarogā samuddasasa cattāro guṇā?
anya-e1210n:1090_5: bahuvidhasaṃvararakkhiyatā’ti sāsanassa ime atulyā pañca guṇā vattanti pakāsanti.
anya-e1210n:1092_0: Āhaccapadena rasena ācariyavaṃsatāya adhippāyākāratāya ñāṇuttaratāyā’ti imehi pañcaguṇehi atho paṭiggahetabbo cā’ti cattāro pañcakā vuttā.
anya-e1210n:1093_5: Vepullo rājagahiyānaṃ buddho aggo pavuccatī’ti cha aggā.
anya-e1210n:1094_3: pubbanimittato’ti cha janā supinaṃpassantī’ti tayo chakkā vuttā.
anya-e1210n:1099_0: Ime satta janā akālamaraṇikā nāmā’ti tayo sattakā vuttā.
anya-e1210n:1100_2: aṭṭhete parivajjiyā’ti imāni aṭṭhaṭṭhānāni paṇḍitehi parivajjanīyānīti parivajjanīyaṭṭhānaṭṭhakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1101_0: Rattoduṭṭho …pe… ete athavināsakā’ti idaṃ athavināsakaṭṭhakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1102_0: Vasena yasapucchāhi …pe… tesaṃ buddhi pabhijjatī’ti idaṃ buddhivisadakaraṇaṭṭhakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1103_0: Kālaṃ desaṃ dīpaṃ kulaṃ janettimāyuṃ māsaṃ nekkhammaṃ viloketī’ti idaṃ bodhisattena vilokiyaṭṭhakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1109_0: Ete aṭṭha anāgate aṭṭha janā vilokiyā”ti;
anya-e1210n:1111_0: Ratto duṭṭho’ca mūḷho ca mānī luddho tathā’laso rājā ca ghātakā aṭṭha nāgasenena desitā’tiidaṃ ghātakaṭṭhakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1112_0: Vāta pittena semhena …pe… akāle tatha viyyatī’ti idaṃ akālamaraṇakāraṇaṭṭhakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1113_1: na rāgupasaṃhitaṃ cittaṃ na dosūpasaṃhitaṃ cittaṃ na mohūpasaṃhitaṃ cittaṃ upaṭṭhāpetabbaṃ,
anya-e1210n:1113_5: mettābhāvanāya mānasaṃ upaṭṭhāpetabbanti idaṃ raññā milidena samādinnaṃ vattaṭṭhakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1114_0: Pupphāpaṇaṃ gadhāpanaṃ phalāpaṇaṃ agadāpaṇaṃ osadhāpaṇaṃ amatāpaṇaṃ ratanāpaṇaṃ sabbāpaṇanti idaṃ āpaṇaṭṭhakaṃ nāmā’ti.
anya-e1210n:1115_0: 9.’Ratto duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca …pe… khippaṃ bhavati pākaṭanti’ idaṃ ittaranavakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1125_0: Gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhu mahī sidhu sarassatī vetravatī vitathā cadabhāgā’tī idaṃnadidasakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1126_0: Sītaṃ uṇhaṃ jighacchā pipāsā uccāro passāvo thinamiddhaṃ jarā byādhi maraṇanti idaṃ kāyānuvattakadasakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1127_9: karontopi pāpaṃ paṭicchannaṃ ācaratī’ti idaṃ gihidussīlādhikaguṇadasakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1128_3: varadhammadesanato dhammadīpagatiparāyaṇatāya’ aggo buddho’ti ekantojudiṭṭhitāya uposathasamādānato dakkhiṇaṃ
anya-e1210n:1128_4: visodhetī’ti ekantojudiṭṭhitāya uposathasamādānato dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetī’ti ekantojudiṭṭhitāya uposathasamādānato
anya-e1210n:1128_5: dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetī’ti idaṃ dakkhiṇāvasena dasakaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1130_8: tulākūṭa mānanakūṭadānananti idaṃ loke adānasammatadānaṃ nāma.
anya-e1210n:1133_0: Dame same khantisaṃvare yame niyame akkodhe vihiṃsāya sacce soceyye’ti dasaṭṭhānesu satataṃ cittaṃ pavattatī’ti idaṃ vessantaraguṇadasakaṃ nāmā’ti.
anya-e1210n:1136_1: satipaṭṭhānavīthikanti idaṃ dhammanagaraparivārekādasakaṃ nāmā’ti dve ekādasakā vuttā.
anya-e1210n:1137_11: āyūhito athasādhanavasena apacitiṃ na karotīti idaṃ apacitiakārakapuggaladvādasakaṃ nāma ekameva āgataṃ.
anya-e1210n:1138_1: Paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ tecīvarikaṅgaṃ piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ sapadānacārikaṅgaṃ ekāsanikaṅgaṃ pattapiṇḍikaṅgaṃ khalupacachābhattikaṅgaṃ
anya-e1210n:1138_2: āraññikaṅgaṃ rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ abbhokāsikaṅgaṃ sosānikaṅgaṃ yathāsathatikaṅgaṃ nesajajikaṅganti idaṃ dhutaṅgaterasakaṃ
anya-e1210n:1140_16: kesesu lūyantesu socanti kilamanti paridevanti urattāḷiṃ kadanti sammohaṃ āpajjantīti idaṃ kesapaḷibodhasoḷakaṃ.
anya-e1210n:1141_0: Tiracchanagato peto micchādiṭṭhito kuhako mātughātako pitughātako arahantaghātako lohituppādako saṅghabhedako
anya-e1210n:1141_1: tithiyapakkantako theyyasaṃvāsako bhikkhunīdūsako terasannaṃ garukāpattīnaṃ aññataraṃ āpajjivā avuṭṭhito paṇḍako,
anya-e1210n:1141_3: ūnasattavassako’ti idaṃ adhammābhisamayapuggalasoḷasakantī dve soḷasakā vuttā.
anya-e1210n:1142_2: oḷārikaviññāṇato hitaviññāṇato ahitaviññāṇato sabhāganimittato vīsabhāganimittato kathābhiñañāṇato lakkhaṇato
anya-e1210n:1142_3: saraṇato muddato gaṇanāto dhāraṇato bhāvanato potthakanibadhanato upanikkhepato anubhutato sati uppajjatīti
anya-e1210n:1144_1: Suti sumuti saṃkhyayogā ñāyavesesikā gaṇitā gadhabbā tikicchā catubbedā purāṇā itihāsajotisā māyā hetu
anya-e1210n:1144_2: mantanā yuddhā chadasā buddhavacanena ekūnavīsatīti idaṃ rañño sikkhitasathekūnavisatikaṃ.
anya-e1210n:1145_1: Aggo yamo seṭṭho niyamo hāro vihāro saṃyamo saṃvaro khanti soraccaṃ ekantacariyā ekattābhirati paṭisallānaṃ
anya-e1210n:1145_2: hiri ottappaṃ vīriyaṃ appamādo sikkhāpadānaṃ uddeso paripucchā sīlādiabhirati nirālayatā sikkhāpadapāripūritāti
anya-e1210n:1145_3: bāvīsatisamaṇakaraṇā dhammā kāsāvadhāraṇaṃ bhaṇḍubhāvo cā’ti dve liṅgāni pakkhipivā vadanakāraṇaguṇabāvīsatikaṃ.
anya-e1210n:1146_1: Ārakkhā sevanā ceva pamattappamattā tathā seyyāvakāso gelaññaṃ bhojanaṃ labbhakañceva viseso ca vijāniyā
anya-e1210n:1146_2: pattabhattaṃ saṃvibhaje assāso ca paṭicāro gāmaviharaṃ cārā be sallāpo pana kātabbo chiddaṃ disvā khameyya
anya-e1210n:1146_3: ca sakkaccākhaṇḍakārī dve arahassāsesakāri dve janeyya janakaṃ cittaṃ vaḍḍhicitataṃ janeyya ca sikkhābale
anya-e1210n:1146_5: Na jahe apadāya ca karaṇīye ca ussukaṃ paggahe khalikaṃ dhamme.
anya-e1210n:1146_6: Iti paṃcavīsa guṇāmilidena pakāsitā’ti idaṃ antevāsikamhi ācariyena kataguṇapaṃcavīsatikaṃ
anya-e1210n:1147_0: Kodho upanāho makkho palāso issā macchariyaṃ māyā sāṭheyyaṃ thamho sāramho māno atimāno mado pamādo thinamiddhaṃ
anya-e1210n:1147_1: nadi ālasyaṃ pāpamittatā rūpā saddā gadhā rasā phoṭṭhabbā budhā pipāsā aratīti idaṃ cittadubbalīkaraṇadhammapañcavīsatikanti
anya-e1210n:1149_0: Mahosadho mahārāja sūro, hirimā, ottāpī, sapakkho,
anya-e1210n:1149_14: dhanavā yasavā’ti idaṃ mahosadhaguṇaṭṭhavīsatikaṃ iti dve aṭṭhavīsatikā vuttā.
anya-e1210n:1150_1: Imehi terasahi dhutaguṇehi pubbe āsevitehi nisevitehi ciṇṇehi pariciṇṇehi caritehi paripūritehi nimittabhūtehi
anya-e1210n:1150_2: ariyasāvako idha bhave tiṃsaguṇavarehi samupeto hoti katamehi tiṃsaguṇavarehi?
anya-e1210n:1150_9: samāpattilābhī hoti, sīla- vara- pavara- asama-
anya-e1210n:1150_16: idha vā huraṃ vā lokena anupalitto,
anya-e1210n:1151_4: sokopi paridevopi dukkho,upāyāsopi appiyehi sampayogopi piyehi vippayogopi,
anya-e1210n:1151_5: mātumaraṇampi pitumaraṇampi bhātumaraṇampi bhaginimaraṇampi ñātimaraṇampi ñātibyasanampi bhogavyasanampi
anya-e1210n:1151_6: sīlabyasanampi diṭṭhibyasanampi rājabyasanampi corabyasanampi veribhayampi dubbhikkhabhayampi aggibhayampi dukkhaṃ,
anya-e1210n:1151_8: ūmibhayampi āvaṭṭabhayampi kumbhīlabhayampi suṃsumārabhayampi attānuvādabhayampi parānuvādabhayampi asilokabhayampi
anya-e1210n:1151_9: daṇḍabhayampi duggatibhayampi parisasārajjabhayampi ājīvikabhayampi maraṇabhayampi mahābhayampi vettehi
anya-e1210n:1151_10: tāḷanampi kasāhi tāḷanampi aḍḍhadaṇḍakehi tāḷanampi hathacchedampi pādacchedampi nāsacchedampi kaṇṇacchedampi
anya-e1210n:1151_11: kaṇṇanāsacchedampi biḷaṅgathālikampi saṅkhamuṇḍikampi rāhumukhampi jotimalikampi hathapajjotikampi erakavattikampi
anya-e1210n:1151_12: cīrakavāsikampi eneyyakampi balisamaṃsikampi kahāpaṇikampi khārāpatacchikampi paḷighaparivattikampi palālapīṭhikampi
anya-e1210n:1151_13: tattenapi telena osiñcanampi sunakhehi khādāpanampi jīvasūlāropaṇampi asināsīsacchedanampīti idaṃ dukkhasaṭṭhikaṃ.
anya-e1210n:1152_0: Saṅkhamuṇḍakanti saṅkhamuṇḍakammakaraṇaṃ taṃ karontā uttaroṭṭhassa ubhayato kaṇṇacūḷikagalavāṭakaparicchedena
anya-e1210n:1152_1: cammaṃ chidivā sabbakese ekato gaṇṭhiṃ kavā daṇḍakena veḍhavā uppāṭenti saha kesehi cammaṃ uṭṭhahati
anya-e1210n:1152_2: tato sīsakaṭāhaṃthūlasakkharāhi ghaṃsivā dhovantā saṅkhavaṇṇaṃ karonti.
anya-e1210n:1153_1: Taṃ karontā sisakaṭāhaṃ uppāṭevā tattaṃ ayoguḷaṃ saṇḍāsena gahevā tatha pakkhipanti.
anya-e1210n:1154_1: Taṃ karontā saṅkunā vivarivā antomukhe dīpaṃ jālenti.
anya-e1210n:1154_2: Kaṇṇacūḷikāhi vā paṭṭhāya mukhaṃ nikhādanena khaṇanti lohitaṃpaggharivā mukhaṃ pūreti.
anya-e1210n:1157_1: Taṃ karontā heṭṭhāgivato paṭṭhāya cammavaṭṭe kantantā gopphake pātentī atha naṃ yottehi badhivā kaḍḍhanti.
anya-e1210n:1157_2: So attano’vacammavaṭṭe akkamivā patati cīrakavāsikanti cirakavāsikakammakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e1210n:1157_3: Taṃ karontā tatheva cammavaṭṭe kantivā kaṭiyaṃ ṭhapenti.
anya-e1210n:1158_1: Taṃ karontā uhosu kapparesu ca jaṇṇukesu ca ayasalākayo davā ayasūlāni koṭṭenti.
anya-e1210n:1158_4: Taṃ sadhisadhito sūlāni apanovā catuhi aṭṭhikoṭīhiyeva ṭhapenti.
anya-e1210n:1160_0: Kahāpaṇakanti sakala sarīraṃ tiṇhāhi vāsīhi koṭito paṭṭhāya kahāpaṇa mattaṃ kahāpaṇa mattaṃ pātentā koṭṭenti.
anya-e1210n:1161_0: Khārāpatacchikanti sarīraṃ tatha tatha āvudhehi paharivā kocchehi khāraṃ saṃsenti cammamaṃsanahārūni paggharivā aṭṭhakasaṅkhalikā’va tiṭṭhati.
anya-e1210n:1162_0: Paḷighaparivattakatī ekena passena nipajjāpevā kaṇṇaṇacchidde ayasūlaṃ koṭṭevā pathaviyā ekabaddhaṃ karonti atha naṃ pāde gahevā āvijjhanti.
anya-e1210n:1163_0: Palālapīṭhikanti cheko kāraṇiko chavicammaṃ acchidivā nisadapotakehi aṭṭhini bhidivākesakalāpe gahevā ukkhipanti.
anya-e1210n:1163_2: Atha naṃ keseheva pariyonadhivā gaṇhanti palālavaṭṭiṃ viya kavā paḷiveṭhentī’ti vinayaṭīkā.
anya-e1210n:1164_0: Imañca saṭṭhividhaṃ dukkhaṃ sallakkhevā bhavesu nibbidivā virajjivā bhavataṇhaṃ pahāvā dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ dukkhānupassanā ñāṇena passitabbanti.
anya-e1210n:1165_0: Diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasatanti pañcasattati sekhiye apanevā sesānaṃ vasena diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasataṃ veditabbanti.
anya-e1210n:1181_6: cūḷābhayathero’ti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyenatherena kato milidaṭīkāgatho samatto.
